hadiths.text: A'isha (Allah be pleased with her) said:It is no good for Fatima to make mention of it, i. e. her statement:" There is no lodging and maintenance allowance (for the divorced women)

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمُطَلَّقَةُ ثَلاَثًا لاَ نَفَقَةَ لَهَا
chapter.eng-name: The woman who has been irrevocably divorced is not entitled to spending
